projects.title: Service Entry Pipeline
projects.description: Automated Oracle → CSV → Email pipeline for daily Service Entry report processing with modular OOP design.

details.description: A comprehensive automated pipeline that connects to Oracle databases, processes daily service entry records, and delivers formatted reports via email.
features: Oracle database connectivity with secure credential management
Parameterized SQL query execution
Automated CSV generation with date stamping
Email distribution with attachment handling
Comprehensive logging and error handling
Modular OOP design for maintainability
details.impact: Reduced manual processing time by 80% and improved data accuracy

projects.title: Invoice Insight Automation
projects.description: Python automation engine for Queensland Health's invoice optimization report, processing 1.8M+ invoices annually.

details.description: Enterprise-grade automation system for Queensland Health's invoice optimization, processing over 1.8 million invoices annually.
features: Nine custom Oracle SQL scripts for data extraction
Batch processing with performance optimization
OCR failure point analysis and reporting
Automated scheduling and execution
Integration with SAP and DSS systems
Real-time performance monitoring
details.impact: Saved 2.5 hours daily processing time, processing $10.56B AUD annually

projects.title: Invoice State Preservation Pipeline
projects.description: Automated Python and Oracle-based pipeline designed to capture, store, and version invoice data exactly as it arrives from SAP, enabling reliable change detection and OCR accuracy analysis.

details.description: A production-style prototype that captures SAP invoice records daily from Oracle, preserves the original state of each document, and enables downstream comparison of updated data to identify field-level changes and OCR failures.
features: Daily Oracle extraction of invoice records
Historical preservation of original invoice attributes
Incremental capture logic to prevent duplicates
Automated CSV append and data validation
Batch processing for scalable handling of high-volume data
Designed to support change detection workflows for OCR accuracy analysis
details.impact: Enabled reliable version tracking of invoice data across lifecycle stages, supporting future PIOR automation and OCR failure analytics.

projects.title: Vendor & Facility Code Search Engine
projects.description: Desktop application built with Python and PySide6 to enable rapid lookup and validation of vendor and facility codes across name, region and company code dimensions. Designed for internal automation workflows supporting high-volume invoice and contract processing pipelines.

details.description: Supports internal lookup workflows by enabling quick filtering and retrieval of vendor/facility company codes. Built with a responsive UI, table-based results, theme toggle, and pre-loaded dataset for instant access.
features: Instant search by company code, name or region
Dark mode + light mode toggle for usability
Custom styled table view for results
Pre-loaded facility/vendor dataset to avoid latency
Built with modular Python backend for future extension into web or API services
details.impact: Improved internal code-lookup workflow speed for finance and contract teams; serves as a reusable utility for our broader data automation ecosystem.
